GK16udkass_u:1: asminbharatakhaṇḍe khalvadyāvadhi bahavaḥ saṃskṛtagranthāḥ saṃśodhya mudraṇadvārā prākāśyaṃ nītāstatra tatra paṇḍitaprakāṇḍaiḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2: tathāpi katicana prājīnāḥ prabandhāḥ prakāśanārhā api pustakakośeṣveva nilīnā vartante /
GK16udkass_u:3: teṣāmanyatamo 'yaṃ kāvyālaṅkārasaṃgrahākhyaḥ prabandho yo 'dya mahatā prayatnena sahṛdayahṛdayavanodāya prakāśyate /
GK16udkass_u:5: udbhaṭabhaṭṭasya bhaṭṭodbhaṭaudbhaṭācāryaḥ ityāpi nāmollekho granthāntareṣu dṛśyate /
GK16udkass_u:9: atastatsabhāpaterudbhaṭabhaṭṭasyāpi jīvitasamayaḥ sa eveti viduṣāṃ nirṇayaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:10: udbhaṭācāryeṇa kumārasaṃbhavākhyaṃ kāvyaṃ tathā bhāmahakṛtālaṅkāragranthasya vivaraṇaṃ ca viracitamāsīditi jñāyate /
GK16udkass_u:11: atra pramāṇaṃ tu asyāṃ laghuvṛttau "anena granthakṛtā khoparacitakumārasaṃbhavaikadeśo 'tra udāharaṇatvenopanyastaḥ"pṛ0 15 iti
GK16udkass_u:12: "viśeṣoktalakṣaṇe ca bhāmahavivaraṇe bhaṭṭodbhaṭena ekadeśaśbada evaṃ vyākhyātaḥ"pṛ0 13 iti ca pratīhārendurājasyoktiḥ /
GK16udkass_u:13: kāvyālaṅkārasāralaghuvṛtteḥ praṇetā śrīpratahārendurājastu koṅkaṇadeśavāstavyaḥ kaśmīreṣu mīmāṃsākhyākaraṇatarkasāhityaśāstrapāraṃgatabhaṭṭaśrīmukulādadhītaśāstraśceti asyā laghuvṛtteḥ prārambhopasaṃhārayoḥ sthitābhyāṃ nimnalikhitapadyābhyāṃ sphuṭaṃ bhavati /
GK16udkass_u:20: pratīhārendurājasya jīvitakālastu niścitya vaktuṃ na śakyate /
GK16udkass_u:26: asya granthasyādarśapustakamekameva puṇyapattanasthārājakīyapustakālayādhikāribhiḥ prophesara vināyaka sakhārāma ghāṭe ityetai saṃskaraṇārthe datvanṛgṛhīto 'smīti kṛtajñatayā smarāmi teṣāmupakṛtim kāravārapure vidvadanucaraḥ śrāvaṇa śu- 12 śake 1837 maṅgeśaśarmā.
GK16udkass_u:30: yallakṣmyā hasitaiḥ sitairdhavalitaṃ narmoktilīlājuṣaḥ śaureḥ sphītagabhastikaustubharucā yacca kvacitpāṭalam /
GK16udkass_u:31: anyatra cchuritaṃ yadambararaca hemaprabhādīprayā tadvakṣo 'kṣataśakracāpaśabalavyomābhamavyājjagat mahiṣitavapuṣi suradviṣi darśitabhayamabhayadaṃ dyusadmabhyaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:42: atrānuprāse rūpake yathākramaṃ tridheti caturiti vacanaṃ vipratipattinirāsārtham /
GK16udkass_u:44: tathā rūpakasya ye catvāro bhedā vakṣyante tanmadhyādādyameva bhedadvitayaṃ prādarśayat /
GK16udkass_u:46: rūpakaṃ caturityatra rūpakatvena saha ekasminnarthe vartamānā sattā rūpakedeṣvāvartamānā pratīyate
GK16udkass_u:47: ataḥ pratīyamānā yāsau rūpakatvaikārthasamavetā sattātmikā bhavanakriyā tadabhyāvṛttāvayaṃ "dvitricaturbhyaḥ suc"(pā. a. 5.4.18) iti sucpratyayaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:48: rūpakaṃ caturṣu bhedeṣu caturo vārān bhedātmanā bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:58: anena ca yatra bhinnarūpe pade ekārthavadābhāsete tatpunaruktābhāsaṃ kāvyamalaṅkāryaṃ nirdiṣṭam
GK16udkass_u:66: tadevamarthasāmarthyāvaseyena vatyarthenānvitaṃ punaruktābhāsamatra kāvyamalaṅkāryaṃ yatkāvyaṃ taddharmatvena punaruktavadābhāsamānayoḥ padayoralaṅkāratvamuktaṃ na tu svatantratayā /
GK16udkass_u:68: alaṅkārasya khalvalaṅkāryaparatantratayā nirūpaṇe kriyamāṇe suṣṭhu svarūpaṃ nirūpitaṃ bhavati
GK16udkass_u:75: tadāprabhṛti satīviyogādārabhya sa devaḥ śitikaṇṭho niḥsaṅgaḥ san divasānatavāhitavāniti vakṣyamāṇe śloke vākyārthaparisamāptiḥ /
GK16udkass_u:77: kālavaśena nivartamānā (yā) satī (tasyāḥ) viyogena janito yaḥ
GK16udkass_u:85: evaṃ śitikaṇṭhakālagalaśabdayorapi valīviśeṣāvacchinnaśarīrāvayavabhedopetārthābhidhāyitvātpaunaruktyaṃ saṃbhāvyamānaṃ kālagaladiti takārāvadhiparyālocanayā cāpasāryate /
GK16udkass_u:95: dvayordvayorajjhalsamudāyayoḥ suṣṭhu sadṛśe uccāraṇe kriyamāṇe sati chekānuprāso bhavati /
GK16udkass_u:97: dvayordvayoriti svārthe 'vadhāryamāṇe anekasminniti dvirvacanaṃ svārthagrahaṇena vīpsāyā nirastatvāt na yāvanto 'tra dvikāḥ saṃbhavanti teṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva susadṛśatvaṃ kāryaṃ, kiṃ tarhi katipayānāmeva /
GK16udkass_u:100: avadhāryamāṇagrahaṇācca dvayordvayorevātra samudāyayoḥ sadṛśatvaṃ, natu trayāṇāṃ trayāṇāmiti draṣṭavyam /
GK16udkass_u:101: anekasminniti vacanācca asakṛdevaṃvidharūpopanibandhe sati chekānuprāsatā na tu sakṛditi mantavyam
GK16udkass_u:102: parasparamekarūpānvitā rasādyabhivyaktyanuguṇatvena labdhotkarṣā varṇāstatsamudāyā vā śobhātiśayahetutvena kāvye kṣiṣyamāṇā anuprāsaśabdenānvarthenābhidhīyante
GK16udkass_u:105: teṣāṃ ca kulāyābhiratatvādanyena kenacidanāyāsyamānānāmanenānuprāsena sadṛśī madhurā vāguccarati
GK16udkass_u:119: atra sadevadivasaśabdau indrakandaraśabdau gariṣṭhagoṣṭhīśabdau prathamapramathaśabdau pariupāsaśabdau ca dvau dvau ajjhalsamudāyau susadṛśāvṛccāritau tena chekānuprāsatā /
GK16udkass_u:128: triṣveteṣu yathāyogaṃ rasādyabhivyaktyanuguṇeṣu varṇavyavahāreṣuyaḥ sarūpāṇāṃ vyañjanānāṃ pṛthak pṛthagupanibandhastamanuprāsaṃ kavayaḥ sadecchantīti /
GK16udkass_u:133: paraṣā nāma vṛttiḥ syāt hlahvahyādyaiśca saṃyutā // UKss_1.4 //
GK16udkass_u:141: toyāśayeṣu aśeṣaṃ sākalyena vyākośitāni vikāsitāni kuśeśayāni padmāni yayā iti samāsaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:142: tathā śālīnāṃ dhānyānāṃ kiṃśārubhiḥ śūkaiḥ kapiśāni piñjarāṇi āśāmukhāni digavakāśā yasyāmiti samāsaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:146: sparśairyutāṃ ca manyante upanāgarikāṃ budhāḥ // UKss_1.5 //
GK16udkass_u:147: sarūpāṇāṃ varṇānāṃ ye saṃyogāḥ kkappacca ityādayastairyuktā /
GK16udkass_u:148: tathā vargāntyair ṅañaṇanamaiḥ ṅkañcaṇṭantampa-ityādirūpatayā upari ye yuktāḥ kādayo makārāntāḥ sparśāstairyuktā upanāgarikā vṛttiḥ /
GK16udkass_u:149: eṣā khalu nāgarikayā vaidagdhījuṣā vanitayā upamīyate tata upanāgarikā /
GK16udkass_u:156: atra dakārākhyaḥ sparśo nakāreṇopari vyavasthitena yuktaḥ sārūpyeṇopanibaddhaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:157: sāndrā ghanā aravindavṛndotthā makarandāmbubindava iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:158: sundaraspandaṃ spandibhiriti sāmānyabhūtaḥ spandaḥ sundaraspandamiti viśiṣṭena spandena viśeṣito raipoṣaṃ puṣṇātītivat /
GK16udkass_u:159: sundaraḥ spandoyasminniti hi sāmānyabhūte spandane anyapadārthe sundaratāviśiṣṭaṃ spandanaṃ vṛttipadārthabhūtam /
GK16udkass_u:165: tasyā eva ca aparaṃ nāmadheyaṃ komaleti /
GK16udkass_u:176: tāsu ca rasādyabhivyaktyānuguṇyena pṛthak pṛthaganuprāso nibadhyate
GK16udkass_u:183: śabdānāṃ vā padānāṃ vā lāṭānuprāsa iṣyate // UKss_1.8 //
GK16udkass_u:189: ubhayeṣāṃ ca śabdapadānāṃ svarūpasya varṇātmanaḥ abhidheyasya ca nirantaraśabdavyāpāragocarīkṛtasya vācyasyārthasyābhede 'pi
GK16udkass_u:194: ekaikasmin pade padasamudāyātmake ca pāde bhāvāt /
GK16udkass_u:199: atra hi svatantrapadātmakatvena dvayoḥ prayogādekaikapadāśrayo lāṭānuprāso
GK16udkass_u:202: kāśāḥ kāśā ivodbhānti sarāṃsīva sarāṃsi ca /
GK16udkass_u:205: atra kāśādayaḥ śabdā aparaiḥ kāśādibhiḥ śabdai ekarūpā ekābhidheyāśca /
GK16udkass_u:207: tathā hyatra ekeṣāṃ kāśādiśabdānāṃ jātibhedoparaktadravyaparatayā prayogaḥ
GK16udkass_u:211: padasamudāyātmakasya tu pādasya svarūpārthāviśeṣe tātparyabhedena punaruktau pādābhyāsaparipāṭyā svatantrapadāśrayo lāṭānuprāso bhavati /
GK16udkass_u:212: pādābhyāsakrameṇa ceti kramagrahaṇena sakṛddvistriśca pādābhyāse ye bhedāḥ saṃbhavanti tatsvīkāreṇa pādābhyāse lāṭānuprāsasya pravṛttiḥ sūcitā /
GK16udkass_u:214: striyo mahati bhartṛbhya āgasyapi na cukrudhuḥ /
GK16udkass_u:215: bhartāro 'pi sati strībhya āgasyapi na cukrudhuḥ // UKss_1.*7 //
GK16udkass_u:217: tathā ca satyapyāgasīti bhartṛbhya iti strībhya iti ca 'krudha druhe'ti
GK16udkass_u:219: atra ekatra pāde nāyakagatāparādhaviṣayatvena strīkartṛkaḥ krodhābhāvaḥ pratipāditaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:236: atra kamalaṣaṭpadamukharaśabdānāṃ svarūpārthabhede 'pi tātparyabhedena punaruktiḥ padadvitayāśrayitvaṃ ca /
GK16udkass_u:240: tathā pūrvaḥ ṣaṭpadaśabdo bhramaṇakriyāṃ prati kartṛtvenopavarṇitaḥ,
GK16udkass_u:244: pūrveṇa mukharaśabdena śaranniṣṭhaṃ maukharyamavagamyate, apareṇa tu sārasaniṣṭham /
GK16udkass_u:250: atra nārīmukheṣviti vadanānāṃ candreṇopamitatvādasitotpalasya śaśakarūpatā dhvanyate /
GK16udkass_u:252: ekasya jīyamānatayā upādānāt, aparasya jayanakriyākartṛbhūtāyāsau śreṇistatsaṃbandhitvena
GK16udkass_u:255: aparasya tu svātantryeṇa padarūpatayāvasthānaṃ tatra bhavati /
GK16udkass_u:268: svatantraparatantrāṇāṃ tasya pratyekaṃ dvibhedatvāt svatantrapara tantrayośca samuditayorekaprakāratvāt
GK16udkass_u:271: guṇavṛtti pradhānena yujyate rūpakaṃ tu tat // UKss_1.11 //
GK16udkass_u:272: bandhastasya yataḥ śrutyā śrutyarthābhyāṃ ca tena tat /
GK16udkass_u:276: padāntarasya guṇavṛtterapareṇa padena yoge rūpakaṃ bhavati /
GK16udkass_u:277: nanvevaṃ sati nīlamutpalamityatrāpi nīlaśabdasya guṇavṛtterutpalaśabdena yoge rūpakatāprasaṅga ityāśaṅkyoktaṃ---śrutyā saṃbandhavirahāditi /
GK16udkass_u:279: tayā śrutyā anupapadyamānapadāntarasaṃbandhaṃ sat padāntaraṃ guṇavṛtti yatrāpareṇa padena yujyate tatra rūpakatā /
GK16udkass_u:284: atrāmbuśabdo nirantarārthaniṣṭhaśabdavyāpāragocarīkṛte udakatve vartamāno jyotsnāśabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ nānubhavati /
GK16udkass_u:286: ato 'mbugatāḥ śauklyāhlādakatvaprasaraṇaśīlatvādayo ye guṇāstatsadṛśajyotsnāgataguṇavṛttiḥ sannambuśabdo jyotsnāyāṃ vartate /
GK16udkass_u:287: tenāmbuśabdasya śrutyā nirantarārthaniṣṭhena abhidhāvyāpāreṇa yaḥ padāntareṇa jyotsnāśabdena saṃbandhastacchūnyatvādguṇavṛttitā /
GK16udkass_u:292: nanu viruddhārthābhidhāyinoḥ samānādhikaraṇayoḥ śabdayornirantarārthaniṣṭhena abhidhāvyāpāreṇa anupapdyamānānyonyasamanvayatvādyadyekasya lakṣaṇayā guṇavṛttitvamabhidhīyate, evaṃ sati paryāyeṇātra guṇavṛttitvaṃ prāpnoti /
GK16udkass_u:295: tadvajjyotsnāśabdasyāpi ambuśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyādguṇavṛttitvaṃ kathaṃ na syādityāśaṅkyoktaṃ pradhāneneti /
GK16udkass_u:298: ataśca prākaraṇikārthābhidhāyitvātpradhānārthaviṣayo yo jyotsnāśabdaḥ tadanurodhena ambuśabdasya aprākaraṇikārthatvādapradhānārthasya guṇavṛttitvamupapannamiti na paryāyeṇa jyotsnāmbuśabdayoḥ parasparānurodhena guṇavṛttitpaprasaṅgaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:299: nanu ca jyotsnāmbunetyatra ambunaḥ prādhānyaṃ jyotsnāyāśca guṇabhāvaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:301: etasmiñśloke tadbhāvādhyavasānena sekāvacchāditarūpatayā sekātmakatvena yāsau vyomno vyāptirasicyateti pratipāditā, tayā svasādhanabhūtaṃ yattadambho 'pekṣitaṃ tadatra jyotsnayā viśiṣyate jyotsnaivāmbviti yadatra sekasādhanatvenāmbu apekṣitaṃ tajjyotsnaivetyarthaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:306: tatkathamidamuktaṃ jyotsnāpadasya prādhānyāttadvaśenāmbuśabdasya guṇavṛttitvaṃ kalpyate iti
GK16udkass_u:311: tatra yadā tāvajjyotsnā amburūpatvamāpadyate tadā prākaraṇikatvāt jyotsnā pradhānam /
GK16udkass_u:315: yadā tvasau ambuśabda āpāditāmbubhāvajyotsnābhidhāyī san sekakriyayā samanvayamāpadyamāno yadetadatra sekasādhanatvenāmbu upayujyate tajjyotsnaiveti jyotsnayā viśiṣyate tadā tasya na rūpakāvasthā /
GK16udkass_u:320: rūpakatvaṃ cātrādhyāropyamāṇagatena rūpeṇa adhyāropaviṣayasya vastuno rūpavataḥ kriyamāṇatvādanvarthaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GK16udkass_u:321: atra copamānavartino ye guṇāstatsadṛśaguṇadarśanādupameya upamānagatayoḥ śabdarūpayorāropaḥ
GK16udkass_u:323: kecidatra śabdāropapūrvakamarthāropaṃ bruvate, apare tvarthāropapūrvakaṃ śabdāropam /
GK16udkass_u:325: ayameva ca pakṣo yukta iva dṛśyate /
GK16udkass_u:342: atra hi sarveṣāmeva rūpyatvenopāttānāṃ jyotsnendutārārātrivyomnāṃ yathākramamambukumbhakusumakanyodyānāni rūpakatvena svakaṇṭhenopāttāni, na tvarthākṣiptaṃ kasyacidrūpaṇam /
GK16udkass_u:345: samagrāṇi hyatra rūpyatvenābhimatāni vastūni svakaṇṭhenopāttasya rūpakasya viṣayaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:347: yatra tu kiṃcitsvakaṇṭhena kiṃciccārthādraṣaṇaṃ bhavati, tatra śrutyarthābhyāṃ rūpaṇādaparaḥ prakāro bhavati /
GK16udkass_u:359: atra dve rūpaṇe svakaṇṭhenābhihite picchālībālaśālibhiriti saronṛpā iti ca /
GK16udkass_u:360: tathā hi ekatra picchālyo bālarūpatvena rūpitāḥ, aparatra tu sarāṃsi
GK16udkass_u:362: rājahaṃsānāṃ cāmararūpatvena rūpaṇā arthākṣiptā, śaradaśca prakṛtāyā nāyikātvena /
GK16udkass_u:363: śarannāyikayā kartṛbhūtayā rājahaṃsacāmaraiḥ picchālībālaśālibhiḥ saronṛpā vījyante smeti hyatra vākyārthaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:365: yadi vā mālārūpakasya samastavastuviṣayatā tatra hyekasmin rūpye samuccayena asyante kṣipyante bahūni rūpakāṇi /
GK16udkass_u:376: atra bhṛṅgamālānāmeva kevalānāṃ rūpyatvenopāttānāṃ tisro rūpaṇāḥ kṛtāḥ vanāntadevatāveṇya ityevamādinā /
GK16udkass_u:377: tenātra samastavastuviṣayatā, ekasmin rūpye samuccayena bahūnāṃ rūpaṇānāṃ kṣiptatvāt-----
GK16udkass_u:385: atra prasādhyata ityayaṃ śabdaḥ śleṣacchāyayā dvayorarthayorvartate bhūṣaṇe upārjane ca /
GK16udkass_u:390: tasya ca parasyāprakṛtasya upārjanasya yattadrūpaṃ kārakakadambakaṃ yena tadrūpavatktrayate nṛpaviśikharājyasaṃgrāmabhūmyātmakaṃ tenātra yathākramaṃ balāhakāsāradhārādiṅabhobhāgānāṃ rūpyatvenābhimatānāṃ rūpaṇā vihitā /
GK16udkass_u:392: ekadeśavṛttītyatra hi ekadā andā īśaḥ prabhaviṣṇuryo vākyārthastadvṛttatvaṃ rūpakasyābhimatam
GK16udkass_u:393: viśeṣoktilakṣaṇe ca bhāmahavivaraṇe bhaṭṭodbhaṭena ekadeśaśabda evaṃ vyākhyāto yathohāsmābhirnirūpitaḥ tatra viśeṣoktilakṣaṇam----
GK16udkass_u:398: aprakṛtaṃ hi tat śleṣavaśenātra nītaṃ, tenātraikadeśavṛttitā //
GK16udkass_u:406: ata eva caikadeśavartināmapi teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yau dvau upamānopameyabhāvena avasthitau vākyārthau bahabo vā tathāvidhāstaduddīpanahetutvāddīpakatā /
GK16udkass_u:413: tābhyāṃ yogaḥ saṃbandho vidyate yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
GK16udkass_u:419: atra saṃharaṇātmā dharmaḥ kadambakusumaśobhākarmakatvena virahiṇīsukhasampatkarmakatvena ca upanibadhyamāno 'ntargatopamaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:421: tenātrāntargatopamatvam, yathā preyoviyoginīnāṃ niḥśeṣāḥ sukhasampadaḥ saṃjahāra tathā kadambakusumaśriyo 'pīti /
GK16udkass_u:422: śaratkālaśabdasya cātra śaratsamayaḥ śleṣacchāyayā antakānurañcito vācyaḥ
GK16udkass_u:424: atra ca prathama eva vākye saṃjahāretyasyopanibaddhasya dvitīyavākye anuṣaṅgacchāyayā upajīvyamānatvādādidīpakatvam
GK16udkass_u:429: śaradaḥ prākaraṇikatvādvideśavasatiyātapatikājanadarśanayoścāprākaraṇikatvādatrāntargatopamatā atra ca yātapatikājanadarśanaṃ duḥkhāya kevalamabhūditi madhyame vākye pravāsiduḥ khaikahetutvalakṣaṇo dharma upāttaḥ sannādyantābhyāṃ vākyābhyāṃ pūrvavadupajīvyate /
GK16udkass_u:437: ante ca sarvasukhahetutvamupanibaddhaṃ sat pūrvatra upajīvyate /

GK16udkass_u:478: te ca mādhuryaujaḥprasādalakṣaṇāḥ yeṣāṃ tu guṇopajanitaśobhe kāvye śobhātiśayahetutvaṃ te 'laṅkārāḥ /

GK16udkass_u:495: mithaḥ parasparaṃ vibhinnāḥ kālādayaḥ pravṛttinimittabhūtā yayoḥ śabdayostathāvidhau śabdau vācakau yayorupamānopameyayoriti bahuvrīhigarbho bahuvrīhiḥ /

GK16udkass_u:506: avyayaṃ hi luptavibhaktikatvena upamānopameyayorekataratrāpyaviśrāntatvādubhayorapyupamānopameyayorupamitikriyāviṣayatayā yathāyogaṃ karmakaraṇabhāvātmakaṃ saṃbandhamavadyotayati /

GK16udkass_u:526: taruṇya iva bhānti sma cakravākaiḥ stanairiva // UKss_1.*19 //
GK16udkass_u:528: yā tūpamā sadṛśādibhiḥ padaiḥ śliṣṭā tasyāṃ na śrautena rūpeṇa ubhayānuyāyitayā upamānopameyabhāvo 'vagamyate /
GK16udkass_u:544: pūrṇondubimbaṃ pratimā pratibimbaṃ sadṛśamasyeti bahūvrīhiratra kriyate /

GK16udkass_u:555: 'netrairivotpalaiḥ'ityādau tu yadyapi netrotpalādīnāṃ samānadharmā dīrghatvanīlatvādayaḥ svaśabdena nopāttāstathāpi bhāntityabhidhīyamānārthe teṣāmanupraveśātsaṃpūrṇatvamevopamāyāḥ, catuṣṭayopalambhāt netrādīni hyatropamānāni /
GK16udkass_u:561: yadā tvatra vākyopamā vivakṣitā bhavati tadaitadevodāharaṇaṃ tadudāharaṇārthatvena akhaṇḍenendunā tulyamāsītsumudakānanam // UKss_1.*21 //
GK16udkass_u:563: evameṣā saṃpūrṇā vākyāvagamyā dvividhopamā pratīpāditā śrautī ārthī ca /

GK16udkass_u:566: tatra tasyevetyanena hi yo vatirvidhīyate tasya ivārthe vidhīyamānatvādivaśabdavacchrautena rūpeṇa ubhayānuyāyitayā upamānopameyabhāvāvagatinibandhanatvam /
GK16udkass_u:567: yaḥ punastena tulyamiti tulyārtho vatirvidhīyate tato brāhmaṇena tulyamadhīte brāhmaṇavadadhīte kṣatriya ityupameye yattadadhyayanakriyādvāreṇa viśrāntaṃ tulyatvaṃ tatparyālocanayā arthādupamānasyopamānatvamavagamyate tenārthastatra upamānopameyabhāvaḥ /

GK16udkass_u:577: api sā sumukhī tiṣṭheddṛṣṭeḥ pathi kathaṃcana /
GK16udkass_u:579: aprārthitopasaṃpannā dṛṣṭeḥ pathi kathaṃcana patitā tiṣṭhediti saṃbandhaḥ
GK16udkass_u:582: vatiśca kriyātulyatve vidhīyamāna upameye kriyādvāreṇa śabdena vṛttena viśrāntaḥ saṃstulyatvaparyālocanayopamānasyopamānatvamavagamayati
GK16udkass_u:593: manmathena samarpitā yāstā nirargalāḥ utkalikāstatkartṛkaṃ bhavanaṃ sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ /

GK16udkass_u:623: sarojakarṇikāgaurīṃ gaurīṃ prati mano dadhau // UKss_1.*25 //

GK16udkass_u:633: dvitayalope tvekaprakārā bhavati, sādhāraṇadharmavācina ivādeśca yugapadaprayogāt /

GK16udkass_u:653: atra hi śaśicchāyātulyā chāyā yasya tathāvidhaṃ vadanaṃ yasyā iti bahuvrīhigarme bahuvrīhau śaśikāntirupamānaṃ, vadanakāntirūpameyā /

GK16udkass_u:669: upamānaṃ, bhagavadātmā upameyaḥ, ācārākhyaḥ sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ

GK16udkass_u:683: karturupamānāduttareṃṇācāraviṣayeṇa kyaṅā sā saṃkṣepopamā kvacinnibadhyata ityarthaḥ /

GK16udkass_u:728: yā tu taddhitasāmarthyāvaseyā vatiśabdādavagamyate, sā saṃpūrṇatvātpūrvamuktā /

GK16udkass_u:862: iyadāstāṃ samudrāmbhaḥ kumbhairmāne tu ke vayam // UKss_2.*1 //

GK16udkass_u:877: na khalu raktaḥ paṭo bhavatītyatra raktatvāvacchinnapaṭabhavanaparatvādvākyasya paṭabhavanaparyavasānamātratvaṃ subhaṇam /

GK16udkass_u:915: tatra hi samarthakasya samarthakatāvagatihetuṃ vyāptiṃ pakṣadharmatvaṃ cānupanyasyārthāntarasyevopanyāsaḥ kriyate /

GK16udkass_u:931: yatra pūrveṇaiva krameṇa samarthyasamarthakayorupanyāse hiśabdaścārthasāmarthyavaseyārthatvānna prayujyate tatra
GK16udkass_u:945: paścātsamarthakasya, tatrāpi samarthyasamarthakabhāve hiśabdāvagater'thākṣipte ca sati dvaividhyam /

GK16udkass_u:2163: guṇarahitaśabdārthaśarīre tu kvāyamātre kāvyaśabdasya kāvyasādṛśyādupacārātprayogo bhaviṣyati
GK16udkass_u:2168: tadviśiṣṭaṃ kāvyaliṅgaṃ sarasapadārthaniṣṭhameva bhavatiṣa na tu nīrasavastumātraniṣṭhaṃ śāstraliṅgavadityupapannam /
GK16udkass_u:2170: kecitkhalu tārkakā vyāptigrahaṇakāle yadanubhūtaṃ vyāpakaṃ vahnyādivastu dhūmādervyāpyasya tatsmaraṇamātre dhūmādihetudarśanaprabuddhasaṃskārāṇāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ hetuvyāpāraṃ manyante /
GK16udkass_u:2171: apare tu vahnyādīnāṃ parvatādidharmaviśeṣasaṃbandhasya pūrvamagṛhītasya dhūmādihetuvyāpārasāmarthyena idānīmeva avaseyatvālliṅgasāmarthyālliṅgyanubhavasyaiva utpattimāhuḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2176: atra vibhūṣaṇavinyāsāspadabhūtā ye kaṇṭhādayastadavaśiṣṭānāmaṅgānāṃ yāsau kāntiḥ dīptiḥ tasyā anujjvalā malinā yāsau chāyā śobhā sā liṅgaṃ,
GK16udkass_u:2182: iṣṭasya prākaraṇikatayā pratipādayitumabhimatasyārthasya yatra vispaṣṭatayā pratibimbaṃ sadṛśa vastu nidarśyate tatra kāvyadṛṣṭānto nāmālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2186: tathāhi---atra rāmadevasya mārīcavadhe vyāpāro nirāyāso hariṇahananodyogikasarikiśorapratibimbitatvena nidarśitaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2190: atra hi pratibambādeva bimbasyonnayanādvispaṣṭarūpatayā iṣṭasyārthasya pratibimbanidarśanaṃ nāsti /
GK16udkass_u:2191: yatra tu iṣṭamarthaṃ svakaṇṭhenopādāya tasya pratibimbamupadarśyate tatra dṛṣṭāntatvam /
GK16udkass_u:2203: nanu yatra kāvye sahṛdayahṛdayāhlādinaḥ pradhānabhūtasya svaśabvyāpārāspṛṣṭatvena pratīyamānaikarūpasyārthasya sadbhavastatra tathāvidhārthābhivyaktihetuḥ kāvyajīvatabhūtaḥ kaiścatsahṛdayairdhvanirnāma vyañjakatvabhedātmā kāvyadharmo 'bhihitaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2212: atra hi rāhuvadhūratotsavasya yā cumbanamātreśeṣatā tatkarmakā cakrābhighātaprasabhājñākaraṇikā cakāreti karaṇalakṣaṇā kriyābhidhīyate /
GK16udkass_u:2213: sā caivaṃvidhā kāryabhūtatvātkāraṇamantareṇānupapadyamānā tathāvidhavairasyakāri rāhuśiraśchedalakṣaṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ nālaṅkārarūpaṃ, nāpi
GK16udkass_u:2219: nanu paryāyoktaśabdena prakārāntareṇa ucyamāntvātpratīyamānaṃ vastu abhidhīyate /
GK16udkass_u:2220: tacceha pratīyamānaṃ pradhānatvādalaṅkāryatayā vaktuṃ yuktam, na tvalaṅkṛtikāraṇatayā /
GK16udkass_u:2224: dṛśyate hi loke vyapadeśaḥ svāmyalaṅkaraṇakā bhṛtyā iti /
GK16udkass_u:2227: yadi vā bhagavadvāsudevavartitayā yo 'sau vīraraso 'vagamyate tadapekṣayā tasya mukhyayaiva vṛttyā guṇabhūtatvādalaṅkāratā /
GK16udkass_u:2229: "snigdhasyāmalakāntiliptaviyato velladbalākā ghanā vātāḥ śīkariṇaḥ payodasuhṛdāmānandakekāḥ kalāḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2230: kāmaṃ santu dṛḍhaṃ kaṭhorahṛdayo rāmo 'smi sarvaṃ sahe vaidehī tu kathaṃ bhaviṣyati hahā hā devi dhīrā bhava" //
GK16udkass_u:2231: ityevamādāvapi rāmādīnāṃ śabdānāmasādhāraṇarūpatayā rājyabhraṃśavanavāsasītāharaṇapitṛmaraṇādayo duḥkhaikahetavaḥ svārthasahacāriṇo vastumātrarūpā vyaṅgyadharmāstatpariṇatarūpatayā svārthasya pratītistadvetubhūtatvātparyāyoktālaṅkārasaṃsparśitaiva /
GK16udkass_u:2232: na khalu pade paryāyoktena bhavitavyamitīyaṃ rājñāmājñā sūtrakāravacanaṃ vā /
GK16udkass_u:2238: tasmānna vastumātre pratīyamāne tadabhivyaktihetuḥ kāvyadharmo dhvanirnāmārthāntaram //
GK16udkass_u:2242: kṣobhaṃ yadeti na manāgapi tena manye suvyaktameva jalarāśirayaṃ payodhiḥ" //
GK16udkass_u:2243: ityādau pratīyamānaikarūpatā, tathāpyanantaroktalakṣaṇeṣvalaṅkāreṣu anupraveśo bhaviṣyati paryāyokte vā /
GK16udkass_u:2244: tathā hyatra śloke mukhyasya lāvaṇyakāntiparipūritadiṅbhukhasya vikasitahāsajyotsnasya saṃbodhanasāmarthyāvasitataralāyatākṣitvasya ca saṃnidhānājjalanidheḥ kṣobhamupapattimattvena saṃbhāvya tadbhāvo jāḍyasamūhāvacchāditasvabhāvatvādabhihitaḥ tathāvidhārthaparyālocanayā cātra mukhasya candreṇa rūpaṇā pratīyate /
GK16udkass_u:2246: na ca yasyālaṅkārasya pratīyamānarūpatā tasyehālaṅkāratvaṃ kenacinnivāritamiti pratīyamānarūpatayā rūpakākhyo 'laṅkāro bhaviṣyati /
GK16udkass_u:2250: ityādau tu śūrādibhiḥ saha suvarṇapuṣpapṛthivīkarmakasya cayanasyānupapadyamānānvayatvātsādṛśyasyānvayenopameyabhūtasya bahulābhatvasya tatsadṛśasya yā lakṣaṇā taddvāreṇa garbhīkṛtopamānopameyabhāvā asaṃbhavadvācyārthā nidarśanā draṣṭavyā /
GK16udkass_u:2257: tathā hyatra sarvaikaśaraṇamakṣayamityādīnāṃ śabdānāmarthabhedena bhinnatve sati yathāyogamekaprayatnoccāryāṇāmekapratayatnoccāryaśabdasadṛśānāṃ voccāraṇam /
GK16udkass_u:2266: bhūyastataprakṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ ca śithilakṣiptaikadorlekhayā tanvaṅgyā na tu pāritaḥ stanabharaḥ ṛṣṭuṃ priyasyorasaḥ" //
GK16udkass_u:2268: tathā hi--atra gotraskhalitasya śrutipathaprāpterīrṣyāvipralambhaśṛṅgāro nāyikāyāḥ saṃmukhībhūto 'pi saṃbhogaśṛṅgāreṇa svahetusāmagryapratilabdhaprakarṣeṇa tirodhāya pradarśitaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2271: punaśca saṃbhogaśṛṅgāreṇa vākyārtho nirvāhito 'na tu pāritaḥ'ityādinā /
GK16udkass_u:2276: yatrāpi bhāvastathā rasabhāvābhāsā rasabhāvatadābhāsapraśamāśca pratīyamānāstatrāpi yathākramaṃ preyasvadūrjasvitsamāhitalakṣaṇālaṅkārayogo vācyaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2281: evaṃ ca trividhe 'pi pratīyamāner'the yacchaṣṭhānāṃ vyañjakatvamanantaropavarṇiteṣūdāharaṇeṣu
GK16udkass_u:2283: ṣaṭprakāratā cātra trividhapratīyamānārthaniṣṭhasyāpi vyañjakatvasya vācyasya vivakṣitatvāvivakṣitatvābhyāmukta
GK16udkass_u:2284: tathā hi---dvividhaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ, vācakaśaktyāśrayaṃ vācyaśaktyāśrayaṃ ca
GK16udkass_u:2286: tatra hyalaṅkārā eva vyajyante, na tu vastumātraṃ nāparasādayaḥ,
GK16udkass_u:2293: "sarvaikaśaraṇamakṣayam"ityādau, tatra śabdaśaktyā ye pratīyante virodhādayo 'laṅkārāstatsaṃskṛtasvabhāvaṃ vācyamavagamyete /
GK16udkass_u:2298: tadevaṃ vācakaśaktyāśrayavyaṅgyabhūtālaṅakāraikaniyate vācyaśaktyāśraye cāsaṃlakṣyakramarasādivyaṅgyaniṣṭhe vyañjakatve vācyasya vivakṣitatvameva
GK16udkass_u:2299: vastumātrālaṅkāraviṣayasya tu vācyaśaktyāśrayasya vyañjakatvasya pratyekaṃ vācyasya vivakṣitatvāvivakṣitatvābhyāṃ dvaividhyam /
GK16udkass_u:2300: tathāhi 'cakrābhighātaprasabhājñaye'tyādau vastuviṣaye vyañjakatve vācyasya vivakṣitatvaṃ kāryavivakṣāpūrvakatvena kāraṇapratītiprasavāt /
GK16udkass_u:2310: upameyasya bahulābhatvasya tatsadṛśasya yā lakṣaṇā tasyā atyantatiraskṛtavācyamūlatvāt /
GK16udkass_u:2311: yadi tvatra na tiḍantenopamānamastīti dṛṣṭyāta tadbhāvādhyavasānātsuvarṇapuṣpapṛthivīcayanalakṣaṇopamānāvacchāditarūpatvena śūrādiviṣayasya bahūlābhatvasyopameyasya prauḍhoktyā pratipattiḥ, tato
GK16udkass_u:2316: yatra cāvivakṣā vācyasya vastuniṣṭhe 'laṅkāraniṣṭhe vā vyañjakatve tatra
GK16udkass_u:2319: ata eva ca sahṛdayairyatra vācyasya vivakṣitatvaṃ tatraiva vastvalaṅkārayoḥ pratīyamānayorvācyena saha kramavyavahāraḥ pravartitor'thaśaktimūlānuraṇanarūpavyaṅgyo dhvanirityuktaṃ, na tu vācyavivakṣāyāmapi /
GK16udkass_u:2320: yatra ca vācyasyāvavakṣā pūrvamuktā "rāmo 'smī'ti 'suvarṇapuṣpā'miti ca tatra vayamadhikāropetaprastutārthānubandhivastūpanibandhādaprastutapraśaṃsābhedatvameva nyāyyaṃ manyāmahe /
GK16udkass_u:2322: yattu pūrvaparyāyoktabhedatvaṃ 'snigdhaśyāmalakāntī'tyādau rāmādīnāṃ śabdānāmabhihitaṃ tadupakramamātrarūpatayā draṣṭavyam /
GK16udkass_u:2324: yatra khalu vācyavivakṣāpūrvakatvena arthāntaraṃ pratīyate 'cakrābhighāte'tyādāvudāharaṇacatuṣṭaye tatra paryāyoktabhedatā /
GK16udkass_u:2333: vastvalaṅkāraviṣaye tu vācyaśaktimūle vyañjakatve pratyekaṃ vācyasya vivakṣitatvāvivakṣitatvābhyāṃ dvibhedatā /
GK16udkass_u:2337: yatra ca vivakṣitatvaṃ tatra vācyasya svataḥsaṃbhavitvātprauḍhoktimātraniṣpāditaśarīratvācca dvaividhyam /
GK16udkass_u:2339: ete cāṣṭau bhedā vācyasya yatrāvivakṣā tadviṣayābhyāṃ pūrvoditābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ bhe dābhyāṃ saṃkalitāḥ santo daśa saṃpadyante /
GK16udkass_u:2340: eta eva tu padavākyaprakāśyatayā dvaiguṇyaṃ bhajamānā viṃśatirbhavti /
GK16udkass_u:2344: yathā ca pradhānabhūte vyaṅgye eṣā vyañjakatā rviśatividhā bhavati, tathā guṇībhūte 'pi yathāsaṃbhavaṃ yojyeti /
GK16udkass_u:2353: vastvalaṅkāravācye dhvanau pratyekaṃ vācyaṃ vivakṣyamavivakṣyaṃ ceti saṃbandhaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2355: śabdaśaktirasāspada iti vācyakaśaktasamāśrayaṃ rasādivyaṅgyaniṣṭhaṃ ca vyañjakatvamuktam /
GK16udkass_u:2359: kuśāgrīyabuddhīnāṃ hi diṅbhātra evopadarśite sati buddhivallī pratānaśatairnānādigvayāpitvena vistāramāsādayatīti //
